articles.title: The Wire creator seeks leniency for drug dealer in Michael K Williams' death - BBC
articles.description: David Simon says no good can come from incarcerating a 71-year-old for Michael K Williams' death.
articles.content:
The Wire co-creator David Simon has asked a judge for leniency when sentencing a man charged in the drug death of actor Michael K Williams. 
Williams, who starred as robber Omar Little in the HBO cr… [+2619 chars]
